items.name: Canon PIXMA MG2520 Photo All-in-One Wired Inkjet Printer
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Printers & Supplies/Printers
items.shortDescription: The Canon PIXMA MG2520 Photo All-in-One Wired Inkjet Printer prints both high-quality photos, as well as crisp documents. Photos are printed using a maximum print color resolution of 4800 x 600 dpi using FINE print head technology. Documents print in vivid colors and sharp black ink due to its hybrid ink system. This photo inkjet printer can also turn HD movie clips into beautiful prints if its a compatible Canon camera or camcorder. Choose this home printer because it can fit anywhere, and also because of several features. Quiet mode lets printing any time without worrying about disturbing others. The Auto Power On feature automatically powers up the printer whenever a photo or document is sent to be printed. It is also Energy Star certified. Lastly, choose The Canon PIXMA MG2520 Photo All-in-One Wired Inkjet Printer because it creates beautiful prints of photos that will always be reminders of most special memories.

items.name: Hisense Chromebook (11.6" Quad-Core Processor)
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Laptops/Shop Laptops by Type/All Laptop Computers
items.shortDescription: Discover a new world of computing power with the Hisense Chromebook. This revolutionary new computer system fires up in seconds for effortless use. Surf the web, prepare documents, video conference, edit photos and more on one effortlessly portable device. The 11.6" Chromebook is easy to use just about anywhere. Wirelessly connect to a WiFi signal or hotspot with the 802.11a/b/g/n/ac connection integrated into the device. Chromebooks are automatically kept up to date, so you'll always have the latest virus protection, plus the latest features like Voice Search. The quad-core Chromebook features a built-in 1.3 megapixel webcam and a microSD memory card reader, as well as USB 2.0 ports, a 3.5mm combo jack and one HDMI port. It has a massive storage capacity, including 2GB DDR3 system memory and 16GB eMMC local storage, that can hold 10,666 photos or 4,571 songs and more. Its standard lithium-polymer battery can provide up to 8.5 hours battery life before recharging is needed.

items.name: Google Chromecast Audio
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Audio/Stereos/Speaker Systems
items.shortDescription: <b>What is Chromecast Audio?</b><br>Chromecast Audio is a small media streaming device that plugs into the AUX input of your speaker,making your speaker WiFi enabled. Use your iPhone, iPad, Android phone or tablet, Mac orWindows laptop, or Chromebook to cast your favorite music, radio stations and podcasts to anyspeaker in the house.<br><br>
items.longDescription: <b>Features:<br>Easily cast music to your speakers</b><br>Tap the Cast button from your music apps to play on the speakers. Play, pause and turn up the volumeright from your phone, anywhere in the house.<br><br><b>Listen to your favorites, anytime</b><br>Millions of songs, radio stations and podcasts from apps like Pandora, Google Play Music, and otherfavorites. Discover more at chromecast.com/audio.<br><br><b>Mirror any audio from your Android phone or Chrome browser</b><br>For apps that are not Cast-enabled, mirror exactly what's playing on your Android* device to yourspeakers. Or, mirror any music streaming website from your laptop's Chrome browser.<br><br><b>Higher quality sound</b><br>Chromecast streams straight from the cloud so you get continuous high-quality sound even whenyou leave the room.<br><br><b>Enjoy your music without interruption</b><br>Casting won't drain your battery or get in the way of other activities. Take a call, play a game, evenleave the room all without interrupting what's playing on your speakers.<br><br><b>Anyone can be the DJ</b><br>Friends and family can cast their music to your speakers using their own phone or tablet too no additional pairing or set-up required.<br><br><b>Plug in and listen</b><br>Get started in 3 easy steps: Plug Chromecast Audio into your speakers and power, connect to WiFi,then tap the Cast button from your favorite audio apps to hear it on the speakers.<br>* Mirroring works with most Android devices<br><br><b>What's in the box:</b><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Chromecast Audio</li><li>3.5mm analog stereo patch cable</li><li>Power cable</li><li>Power adapter<br><br><b>Requirements:</b><br></li><li>A speaker system with an aux/line input, RCA or optical input (RCA and optical cables not included)</li><li>WiFi network</li><li>A compatible computer or mobile device. Minimum OS requirements are Android 4.1+, iOS 7.0+, Windows7, or Mac OS X 10.7.</li><li>Availability and performance of certain features, services and applications are device- and network-dependentand may not be available in all areas; subscription(s) may be required, and additional terms,conditions and/or charges may apply.</li></ul>
